doc.field: Mick Moloney Irish-American Music and Popular Culture Field Recordings
Mick Moloney Irish-American Music and Popular Culture Field Recordings

MacMathuna, Seamus (singer) Audio letter to Moloney. MacMathuna and wife introduce private performances of songs and a field recording of a song recorded in Miltown Malbay (15 minutes); tunes performed and introduced by Eddie Moloney from Ballinakill, Co Galway (15 minutes); rough mixes of unidentified fiddle, flute and guitar. (Total length: 01:00:00). aiamm691C
